title: Ali's Film Club: The Babadook
content: Ali is joined by comedian, writer and super friend of the show Kiri Pritchard-McLean to talk about their mutual love for Australian psychological horror, The Babadook.
contentSnippet: Ali is joined by comedian, writer and super friend of the show Kiri Pritchard-McLean to talk about their mutual love for Australian psychological horror, The Babadook.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 1
itunes.subtitle: Ali is joined by comedian Kiri Pritchard-McLean to talk about a modern day classic horror
